title: President Donald J. Trump Signs S. 544 into Law – The White House
content:
Statements & Releases			

		Veterans	

Issued on:
April 19, 2017
On Wednesday, April 19, 2017, the President signed into law:S. 544, which eliminates the termination date of the Veterans Choice Program; to modify reimbursement and cost-recovery procedures for care provided under the Program; and to authorize the sharing of certain veterans’ medical records with medical service providers outside the Department of Veterans Affairs.
